AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa: defendant in a case involving illegal re-entry after deportation, sentenced to 90 months of imprisonment, native and citizen of Mexico, signed the Plea Agreement and Plea Agreement Addendum, pleaded guilty before a United States Magistrate Judge
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: the government entity involved in the prosecution of Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa
